Packages that use arb.stochastic
Package
Description
arb.stochastic
 
arb.stochastic.dynamics
 
  • Classes in arb.stochastic used by arb.stochastic
    Class
    Description
    CharacteristicFunction
    The characteristic function of any real-valued random variable completely defines its probability distribution.
    DensityFunction
    The probability density function (PDF) of a continuous distribution is defined as the derivative of the corresponding (cumulative) distribution function
    DistributionFunction
    The distribution function of a ramdom variable is the integral of the corresponding density function

    GaussianDensityFunction
    Normal distributions are important in statistics and are often used in the natural and social sciences to represent real-valued random variables whose distributions are not known.
